conclusion: No violation of Article 14+8 - Prohibition of discrimination (Article 14 - Discrimination) (Article 8-1 - Respect for family life;Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life)
docname: CASE OF GAS AND DUBOIS v. FRANCE - [Armenian Translation] by the COE Human Rights Trust Fund
